alert.note: Alert for Spink (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 19 at 9:03AM MDT until August 23 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in South Dakota... James River at Ashton affecting Spink County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...James River at Ashton. * WHEN...Until Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, flooding begins to affect crop land, along with moderate flooding of pasture and low-lying areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 13.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:45 AM CDT Saturday was 13.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 13.3 feet tomorrow evening. It is then forecast to fall below flood stage early Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/abr. The next statement will be issued when necessary.
